page.title: 20Mrs Rosina Corp
page.content:
{A Day in the life of Mrs Rosina Corp.
Mrs Corp is the chairman of governors of Nadder Middle School. She is also a local councillor and well known member of the community. She got up at 8 o'clock. At 9 o'clock she started baking cakes. One set of cakes for the old peoples tea in Nadder Close and one set for a lady who was ill and she was going to visit. This took her 2 hours. Then she had to visit a lady who was going to move into a council house. The lady concerned lived alone in a large house and was in her eighties. That took her until lunch. In the afternoon she had to go to Dinton to collect 100 black dustbin liners for the OAP's. These she distributed at the tea party. In the evening she went out with a lady who is learning to drive. Then bedtime
